mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_group_access where channel_id_ in (select t.id_ from ujcms_channel t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_group_access (group_id_, channel_id_, site_id_) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
